collection:
Data Collection** We collect feedback from our users to improve
SheikhGPT.

Providing your email address is optional and will be used solely
for further correspondence related to your feedback.

However, our website uses Google Analytics for tracking visitor data
and interactions.

Consent for Data Collection** SheikhGPT will obtain your explicit
consent before sending feedback to us.

Data Security and Storage** Data collected by SheikhGPT is stored
securely by Google.
sharing:
Data Sharing** We do not share your personal data with any third
parties.
